mutants.code:
def reverse_string(s):
    chars = list(s)
    start = 1
    end = len(chars) - 1
    while start < end:
        (chars[start], chars[end]) = (chars[end], chars[start])
        start += 1
        end -= 1
    reversed_string = ''.join(chars)
    return reversed_string

def reverse_string(s):
    chars = list(s)
    start = -1
    end = len(chars) - 1
    while start < end:
        (chars[start], chars[end]) = (chars[end], chars[start])
        start += 1
        end -= 1
    reversed_string = ''.join(chars)
    return reversed_string
